item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

26. What, if anything, should I do about using Mozilla's Firefox (104 points | 106 comments)
27. Nuclear Reactor Lasers: From fission to photon (2019) (61 points | 7 comments)

29. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (175 points | 227 comments)
